bwwExcerpt: A life raft in this troubled “Water” is the production's elastic ensemble, which jolts you awake with their spring-loaded flips and death-defying stunts, ranging from aerial hoops to tightrope walks to trapeze swings. A sequence of the cast pitching a big top is wondrous to behold, as is the effortless athleticism they bring to numbers like "Zostan." In these moments, the show feels like a divine celebration of those restless spirits who run off to join the circus. But the magic is fleeting, and
